about.title: About First Aluminum Technology
about.subtitle: Leading the Future of Food Packaging
about.description: First Aluminum Technology is a premier B2B supplier specializing in disposable food packaging solutions. With years of experience in the industry, we provide high-quality aluminum foil containers, disposable food boxes, and eco-friendly chopsticks to businesses worldwide.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a vision to revolutionize the food packaging industry, First Aluminum Technology has grown from a small manufacturing operation to a global leader in disposable food packaging solutions.
story.paragraph2: Today, we serve over 500 clients across 40+ countries, maintaining our commitment to quality, innovation, and sustainability in every product we manufacture.

manufacturing.title: State-of-the-Art Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Our modern facilities in China and Malaysia are equipped with the latest technology and adhere to the highest international quality standards.

certifications.title: Certifications & Standards
certifications.description: We maintain the highest quality standards with comprehensive certifications and regular audits.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide sustainable, safe, and cost-effective food packaging solutions that meet the evolving needs of the global food service industry.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and ordering process.

products.question: What products do you manufacture?
products.answer: We specialize in: • Aluminum foil containers - For takeaway, catering, airline meals, baking • Household & catering aluminum foil rolls - Various sizes and specifications • Silicone baking paper - With or without custom print • Related custom packaging materials - Tailored to your needs. We support both OEM & ODM projects with comprehensive customization options.

company_type.question: Are you a trading company or a factory?
company_type.answer: We are a direct manufacturer with: • Main factory in China - Advanced production facilities • New factory in Malaysia - Strategic location for global markets. This dual-location setup allows us to offer: ✓ Stable supply chain ✓ Competitive pricing ✓ Faster shipping to key markets (U.S., EU, Southeast Asia) ✓ Flexible product origin options

certifications.question: What certifications do your products have?
certifications.answer: All products meet international food-grade standards with comprehensive certifications: Food Safety Certifications: • FDA (USA) - Food contact approval • LFGB (Germany) - European food safety standards • DGCCRF (France) - French food contact regulations. Quality & Compliance: • SGS - International quality verification • ISO 9001/14001/45001 - Quality, environmental, and safety management • BRC, BSCI, SEDEX - Social responsibility and ethical compliance

moq.question: What is your Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ)?
moq.answer: Standard MOQ by Product Type: • Aluminum foil containers: 10,000 pcs/SKU • Aluminum foil rolls: 3,000–5,000 rolls • Silicone baking paper: 3,000 rolls. Flexible Options: • Trial orders with lower quantities accepted for market testing • Adjusted terms available for new customers • Mixed loading to optimize container utilization

food_grade.question: Are your products food-grade?
food_grade.answer: Yes, 100% food-safe certified for all contact types: Safe for Contact With: • Hot foods (up to 220°C) • Cold foods (freezer safe to -20°C) • Acidic foods (citrus, tomatoes) • Oily/greasy foods. Compliance Standards: • FDA, LFGB, DGCCRF approved • International food safety regulations • Regular third-party testing and verification

samples.question: Can I get free samples?
samples.answer: Yes, samples are Free of Charge (FOC): Sample Policy: • Free product samples for evaluation • Buyer covers shipping costs only • Use your courier account or we quote door-to-door rates. Sample Options: • Standard products - Available immediately • Custom samples - Small setup fee (deducted from order) • Delivery time: 5–7 business days worldwide

customization.question: Do you offer custom branding and packaging?
customization.answer: Yes! Comprehensive customization available: Branding Options: • Logo embossing on foil lids and containers • Branded boxes, sleeves, labels for retail packaging • Custom sizes and shapes to your specifications • Printed silicone paper (up to 4 colors). Services Included: • Full private label solutions • Free design support from our team • OEM/ODM project management • Retail-ready packaging solutions

lead_time.question: What is your typical lead time?
lead_time.answer: Production & Delivery Timeline: First Orders: • 25–30 days after sample/packaging approval • Includes tooling setup and quality verification. Repeat Orders: • 15–20 days standard production time • Priority scheduling for established customers. Urgent Projects: • Contact us for rush order solutions • Flexible scheduling based on capacity • Express shipping options available

mixed_loading.question: Can I combine multiple SKUs in one container?
mixed_loading.answer: Yes, mixed loading fully supported: Benefits: • Reduce shipping costs per unit • Simplify inventory management • Optimize container utilization • Single documentation process. Flexible Options: • Multiple product types in one shipment • Different sizes and specifications • Custom palletization available • Detailed packing lists provided

payment_terms.question: What are your payment terms?
payment_terms.answer: Flexible Payment Options: Standard Terms: • T/T: 30% deposit, balance before shipment • Secure bank transfer process. Extended Terms (Qualified Clients): • Net 30–60 days (Sinosure credit approval required) • L/C (Letter of Credit) for qualified customers • Multiple currencies: USD, EUR, RMB accepted. Security & Trust: • Sinosure credit insurance available • Transparent payment process • Regular customer credit reviews

quality_control.question: How do you control product quality?
quality_control.answer: 5-Step Quality Management System: 1. Incoming Material Inspection (IQC) - Raw material verification and testing - Supplier certification requirements. 2. In-Process Quality Control (IPQC) - Real-time production monitoring - Process parameter verification. 3. Final Quality Control (FQC) - Complete product inspection - Functional testing and verification. 4. Pre-shipment QC (OQC) - Final inspection before packaging - Documentation and certification. 5. Random Batch Inspection - AQL 1.0 standard compliance - Third-party inspection welcome - ISO 9001 certified facilities

packaging.question: What kind of packaging do you use?
packaging.answer: Export-Ready, Durable Packaging: Primary Protection: • Double-corrugated cartons with load testing • Inner PE bags for moisture protection • Shrink wrap/bubble film for extra security. Shipping Options: • Palletized loads on request • Custom color boxes for retail-ready products • Eco-friendly packaging (biodegradable, recyclable). Quality Assurance: • Load testing for sea freight • Moisture-resistant materials • Clear labeling and documentation • Damage-free delivery guarantee

industries.question: What industries do you serve?
industries.answer: Diverse Industry Coverage: Food Service & Retail: • Foodservice distributors - Wholesale and distribution • Supermarkets and retail brands - Private label solutions • Takeaway & restaurant chains - Volume supply programs. Specialized Markets: • Airline & railway catering - Certified food service solutions • Bakeries & baking supply chains - Professional baking products • Household product importers - Consumer market solutions. Emerging Sectors: • Sustainability-focused packaging startups - Eco-friendly solutions • E-commerce food delivery - Packaging for online orders

export_countries.question: Which countries do you export to?
export_countries.answer: Global Reach: 40+ Countries Served. North America: • United States, Canada. Europe: • United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Poland • Netherlands, Belgium, Italy, Switzerland. Southeast Asia: • Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam • Singapore, Indonesia, Cambodia. Middle East: • UAE, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Qatar. Latin America: • Chile, Brazil, Colombia, Peru, Mexico. Growing Markets: • Australia, New Zealand, South Africa • Expanding presence in emerging markets

shipping_customs.question: Can you help with shipping and customs?
shipping_customs.answer: Complete Logistics Support: Shipping Terms Available: • FOB - Free On Board • CIF - Cost, Insurance, and Freight • DDP - Delivered Duty Paid. Documentation & Customs: • Full document preparation and booking support • HS code classification and customs assistance • Certificate of origin and trade documentation • Customs clearance guidance. Flexible Options: • Dual origin capability (China or Malaysia) • Support for your appointed freight forwarder • Third-party logistics coordination • Express shipping for urgent orders

why_choose.question: Why choose FirstAlu as your supplier?
why_choose.answer: Your Strategic Advantage Partner: ✅ Manufacturing Excellence • 100% factory direct with 10+ years export experience • BRC, BSCI, SEDEX, ISO certified operations • Dual-factory setup (China + Malaysia). ✅ Customer-Centric Service • Dedicated communication team and quick response • Support for both large distributors and fast-growing brands • Flexible solutions tailored to your market needs. ✅ Strategic Benefits • U.S.-focused solutions via Malaysia plant for tariff optimization • Global logistics network for efficient delivery • Trusted by customers across EU, USA, LATAM, and ASEAN. ✅ Innovation & Quality • Continuous product development and improvement • Comprehensive customization capabilities • Sustainable packaging solutions for modern markets

cooking_freezing.question: Can I cook and freeze food in aluminum foil containers?
cooking_freezing.answer: Yes. Aluminum foil containers are unaffected by extremes in temperature. They can go from freezer to oven and back to the freezer. Temperature Range: • Freezer safe: -20°C (-4°F) • Oven safe: Up to 220°C (428°F) • Microwave compatible: Remove lid first. Benefits: • No thermal shock damage • Maintains food quality and freshness • Perfect for meal prep and batch cooking

food_compatibility.question: Can aluminum foil containers be used with all foods?
food_compatibility.answer: Yes. Aluminum foil containers are compatible with all foods and are odor and moisture proof. Food Safety Features: • Inert material - won't react with food • Odor proof - prevents flavor transfer • Moisture proof - maintains freshness • FDA approved for direct food contact. Suitable for all food types: • Acidic foods (tomatoes, citrus) • Dairy products • Meat and poultry • Vegetables and grains • Ready-to-eat meals

cooking_time.question: Do foods take longer to cook when using aluminum pans?
cooking_time.answer: Aluminum pans do not affect the amount of cooking time, however cooking times may vary based on your oven. Cooking Performance: • Excellent heat conduction - even cooking • No time adjustment needed - cook as normal • Consistent results across different ovens. Factors affecting cooking time: • Individual oven calibration • Food thickness and density • Oven rack position • Whether lid is used or removed

aluminum_ideal.question: Is Aluminum an Ideal Material for Food Containers?
aluminum_ideal.answer: Absolutely! Aluminum stands out as an ideal choice for crafting food containers. It's remarkably lightweight, inherently robust, and boasts exceptional thermal conductivity, all of which effectively ensure your food remains fresh and perfectly preserved. Key Advantages: • Lightweight - easy handling and transport • Robust durability - won't crack or break • Exceptional thermal conductivity - even heating • Food preservation - maintains freshness • Recyclable - environmentally responsible. Professional Benefits: • Cost-effective for commercial use • Stackable design for efficient storage • Leak-proof construction • Professional presentation for catering

safety.question: Is Aluminum Food Packaging Safe to Use?
safety.answer: Yes, aluminum food packaging is unequivocally safe. Its inert nature means it won't react with your food, which is precisely why it's so widely adopted across the food industry. As your trusted manufacturer of aluminum food containers, we consistently adhere to the most stringent safety standards, giving you complete peace of mind. Safety Certifications: • FDA approved for direct food contact • LFGB certified (European food safety) • BRC Global Standard for packaging • ISO 9001 quality management. Safety Features: • Inert material - no chemical reactions • Non-toxic coating and construction • Heat resistant - safe at cooking temperatures • Food-grade aluminum meeting international standards

recyclable.question: Are Aluminum Containers Recyclable?
recyclable.answer: Yes, aluminum foil containers are recyclable. This material is a highly recyclable material, and recycling these products helps conserve resources and reduce waste. To recycle make sure to clean them from any food residue and place them in the recycling bin. Recycling Benefits: • 100% recyclable - can be recycled indefinitely • Energy efficient - recycling uses 95% less energy than new production • Resource conservation - reduces raw material demand • Environmental impact - significantly lower carbon footprint. How to Recycle: • Clean containers - remove all food residue • Check local guidelines - recycling programs vary • Place in recycling bin - with other aluminum items • Support circular economy - aluminum-to-aluminum recycling

custom_design.question: Can We Request Custom-Designed Aluminum Foil Products from Manufacturers?
custom_design.answer: Certainly! We specialize in providing bespoke packaging and storage solutions tailored to your unique requirements. Whether you need specific branding, custom dimensions, or distinctive packaging features, we are fully equipped to bring your vision to life. Custom Design Services: • Custom dimensions - any size specification • Branding & printing - logos and marketing • Unique shapes - specialized container designs • Custom lids - various sealing options. Process: • Initial consultation - understand your needs • Design development - create prototypes • Sample approval - test and refine • Production - manufacture to specification. Applications: • Airline catering - specific size requirements • Retail packaging - branded consumer products • Industrial use - specialized applications

contact_manufacturers.question: How Can We Reach Aluminum Foil Product Manufacturers for Inquiries or Orders?
contact_manufacturers.answer: Connecting with us is incredibly straightforward! You can either visit our official website or directly contact our dedicated customer support team. We are always on hand to assist with all your inquiries and to process your orders efficiently. Contact Options: • Website: www.disposablefoilbox.com • Email: info@firstalu.com • Phone: +86 186 3886 1012 • WhatsApp: Available for instant messaging. Response Time: • Email inquiries: Within 24 hours • Quote requests: Within 48 hours • Technical support: Same day response • Emergency orders: Immediate assistance available. What to Include in Your Inquiry: • Product specifications - size, quantity, requirements • Timeline needs - when you need delivery • Custom requirements - any special features • Company information - for accurate quoting

recycling_programs.question: Do Aluminum Foil Product Manufacturers Offer Recycling Programs for Their Goods?
recycling_programs.answer: Yes, we place a strong emphasis on sustainability. Our commitment to environmental responsibility extends to the realm of recycling. While we may not operate specific in-house recycling programs, it's important to note that aluminum foil is broadly accepted at recycling facilities worldwide. We actively encourage the responsible disposal and recycling of our products, contributing together to a greener future. Our Sustainability Commitment: • Eco-friendly manufacturing processes • Recyclable materials - 100% aluminum content • Partner with recycling facilities worldwide • Environmental education for customers. Recycling Support: • Guidance on recycling best practices • Information on local facilities when available • Sustainable packaging for shipments • Carbon footprint reduction initiatives. Industry Leadership: • Promoting circular economy principles • Supporting waste reduction initiatives • Partnering with environmental organizations
